title: 12/30/20 – HOUR 3 -  The James Family Method of Parenting. PLUS, Plaxico Burress
itunes:title: 12/30/20 – HOUR 3 -  The James Family Method of Parenting. PLUS, Plaxico Burress
description:
LaVar Arrington and T.J. Houshmandzadeh fill in for Dan Patrick and are joined by fellow 'Up On Game' co-host Plaxico Burress! The guys talk about the difficulty in raising kids with celebrity status and Dwayne Haskins' downfall since entering the league in 2019. Plus, LaVar and T.J. debate whether or not parents should shield their kids from social media and explain why Urban Meyer would be a perfect fit for the Jacksonville Jaguars.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
